name: omnaiview-parent
description: Frontend for time-series data receiving, visualising and analysing

scripts.build:angular: npm run prepare && npm exec -w angular-frontend ng build
scripts.watch:angular: npm exec -w angular-frontend ng build --watch --configuration development
scripts.start:electron: npm exec -w electron tsc && npm exec -w electron electron-forge start
scripts.build:electron: npm exec -w electron tsc && npm exec -w electron electron-forge make
scripts.build: npm run build:angular && npm run build:electron
